name: Discarded (CLovine, scottfoxyt, Halverus)
description:
WARNING: Very, very incomplete. Play at your own peril 💀.

WASD or left joystick to move!

Arrow keys or right joystick to attack!

(Currently only on desktop): Q to pick up items. Double click items in your inventory to select them!

Play as a discarded pet trying to stave off monsters using only the trash you find in the dumpster!

Nicolas Torres - level generation, combat

Lance Dugars - scriptable objects, items, combat

Scott Spears - art, combat, enemy AI

Generation code based on: https://abitawake.com/news/articles/procedural-generation-with-godot-creating-ca...

Funny Font: https://www.fontspace.com/please-dont-leave-nbp-font-f15345
